### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Offshore Pump at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position (106.5, -32.5) and connected pipes at positions [(105.5, -32.5), (105.5, -31.5), (106.5, -31.5), ... , (108.5, -30.5), (109.5, -30.5), (109.5, -31.5)]

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) and connected pipes at positions [(109.5, -33.5), (110.5, -33.5), (111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), (109.5, -30.5), (109.5, -31.5)]

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5) and connected pipes at positions [(115.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5), (119.5, -28.5), (117.5, -27.5), (119.5, -27.5), (118.5, -27.5)]

### Furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
Consists of furnace at position (41.0, -80.0) and connected burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)

### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)

### Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0) and connected furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)

### Electricity Group
Consists of small electric poles at positions [(111.5, -30.5), (111.5, -27.5), (115.5, -32.5), (112.5, -24.5), (120.5, -26.5), (115.5, -30.5)]

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities function
- Ensure that the correct number of arguments are passed to the function.
- Ensure that the arguments passed to the function are of the correct type.

### Errors when using entity positions
- Ensure that entity positions are accessed correctly, using the position attribute.
- Ensure that entity positions are used correctly, taking into account their x and y coordinates.

### Errors when checking for coal in inventory
- Ensure that the correct variable is used to check for coal in inventory.
- Ensure that the variable is defined before it is used.

### Errors when using entity fuel
- Ensure that entities are fueled correctly, using the correct type and amount of fuel.
- Ensure that entities are checked for fuel correctly, using the correct attributes and methods.

### NAMESPACE
- connect_entities function: 
  - Success modes: None
  - Failure modes: TypeError when incorrect number of arguments are passed, TypeError when incorrect type of arguments are passed
- Important variables:
  - drill: BurnerMiningDrill object
  - furnace: Furnace object
  - coal_in_inventory: float
  - source: undefined
  - target: undefined
  - connection_type: undefined
